colorCustomizer.title: Edit Colors
colorCustomizer.tip: Click any color circle to open the picker. Related colors auto-adjust for harmony.

descriptions.primary: Main brand color used for buttons and key elements
descriptions.secondary: Supporting color that complements your primary
descriptions.background: Base background color for your designs

generating.title: Generating Color Palettes...
generating.tip: Our AI is analyzing your project requirements to create harmonious color palettes that reflect your brand's personality and target audience. This process ensures each palette is optimized for accessibility and visual impact.

errors.title: Generation Failed
errors.generationFailed: Failed to generate color palettes. Please try again.
errors.noOptions: No typography options available. Please go back to the color selection step.

success.title: Select Your Brand Colors
success.subtitle: Choose the color palette that best represents your brand's personality and values.
success.greatChoice: Great choice! Click Next to continue to the next step.

auth.title: Please Sign In
auth.message: You need to be authenticated to generate color palettes. Please sign in to continue.

logoEditor.title: Logo Editor Assistant
logoEditor.subtitle: AI-powered logo modifications
logoEditor.initialGreeting: Here is your selected logo. You can ask me to modify it!
logoEditor.welcomeMessage: Tell me what changes you'd like to make. For example: "Make it more modern", "Change the colors to blue", "Add a gradient effect", etc.

placeholders.prompt: Describe the changes you want... (Press Enter to send)

errors.modificationFailed: Sorry, I encountered an error while modifying the logo. Please try again with a different prompt.

icon.title: Icon Based
icon.description: An easy to remember shape in the center of your logo design

name.title: Name Based
name.description: Your company name as a key element of your logo design

initial.title: Initial Based
initial.description: Initials as the main element of your logo design

ai.title: AI Generation
ai.description: AI creates unique logos based on your brand

custom.title: Custom Description
custom.description: Describe exactly how you want your logo

description.label: Logo Description
description.placeholder: Example: Minimalist logo with a mountain peak, blue and white colors, adventure and trust...

generating.title: Generating Your Logos...
generating.subtitle: Creating personalized logos based on your brand preferences.
generating.tip: Our AI is analyzing your color palette and typography to create logos that perfectly match your brand identity.

errors.title: Generation Failed
errors.colorAndTypographyRequired: Color and typography must be selected before generating logos.
errors.generationFailed: Failed to generate logos. Please try again.
errors.preferencesNotFound: Logo preferences not found. Please restart the generation process.

success.title: Choose Your Perfect Logo
success.subtitle: Select the logo that best represents your brand identity
success.greatChoice: Great choice! Click Next to continue to the next step.

initial.title: Logo variations
initial.subtitle: We will create several variations of your selected logo for different usage contexts.

lightBackground.title: Light Background
lightBackground.description: Optimized for white and light backgrounds

darkBackground.title: Dark Background
darkBackground.description: Optimized for dark and modern backgrounds

multipleFormats.title: Multiple Formats
multipleFormats.description: With text and icon alone for all contexts

generating.subtitle: Creating different versions of your logo for various use cases.

success.title: Logo Variations
success.subtitle: Select the variations you want to keep for your project.

descriptions.withTextLight: Full logo optimized for light backgrounds
descriptions.withTextDark: Full logo optimized for dark backgrounds
descriptions.iconOnlyLight: Icon only optimized for light backgrounds
descriptions.iconOnlyDark: Icon only optimized for dark backgrounds

projectDescription.whatToBuild: What do you want to build ?
projectDescription.tellUsMore: Tell us more about your project idea
projectDescription.placeholder: An app that generates poems from photos

mpesa.name: M-Pesa Clone
mpesa.description: A mobile money transfer and microfinancing service for African markets
mpesa.prompt: A mobile money platform like M-Pesa with secure transactions, agent network management, and financial inclusion features for rural communities in Africa

agritech.name: Agri-Tech Platform
agritech.description: Farm management system for small-scale African farmers
agritech.prompt: An agricultural management platform for small-scale African farmers with weather forecasting, crop disease detection using AI, and marketplace for selling produce directly to buyers

solar.name: Solar Pay-as-you-go
solar.description: Solar energy payment and management system
solar.prompt: A pay-as-you-go solar energy management system for off-grid communities in Africa with mobile payments, usage tracking, and maintenance alerts

health.name: Health Passport
health.description: Digital health records for underserved communities
health.prompt: A digital health passport app for underserved African communities that works offline, stores vaccination records, and connects patients with local healthcare providers

artisan.name: African Artisan Marketplace
artisan.prompt: An e-commerce platform connecting African artisans directly with global buyers, featuring secure payments, logistics management, and cultural storytelling for each product

edtech.name: EdTech for Low Bandwidth
edtech.description: Educational platform optimized for low connectivity
edtech.prompt: An educational platform designed for low-bandwidth African regions with offline content caching, SMS-based learning modules, and localized curriculum in multiple African languages

aiAssistant.initialGreeting: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. Describe the infrastructure you'd like to deploy.
aiAssistant.architectureAccepted: Great! The architecture has been accepted. Now let me check if any sensitive variables are needed for this deployment...
aiAssistant.architectureAcceptedMessage: The architecture has been accepted. Please analyze the components and let me know if any sensitive variables (API keys, passwords, database credentials, etc.) are needed for this deployment.
aiAssistant.greeting: Hello! {{userName}}, I'm IDEM DevOps Assistant. I can generate and deploy your project or infrastructure for you, and manage responsive deployments. How can I help you today?

sensitiveVariables.title: Sensitive Variables Required
sensitiveVariables.description: The AI needs some sensitive information to complete your deployment configuration. These values will be stored securely and encrypted.
